content: SeedlyTV EP06 CPF Asked by AnonymousAsked on 08 Jun 2019If my MA is maxed at 57,200, how would they distribute my monthly salary?It seems like its only going into my OA and SA? What if my SA and MA is maxed at 176k and 57.2k respectively? Where then would the money go to?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Siow NanLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 08 Jun 2019Ma component will overflow to SA first. If SA maxed out, then the Ma component will flow to OA instead. SA and OA normal contribution will be as per norm0 comments5
